title: Finalization of setoff; credit on debt
context: [ยง231-55] Finalization of setoff; credit on debt. Upon completion of the hearing and appeal process set out in section 231-54, or upon the debtor&rsquo;s failure to timely request a hearing pursuant to that section, the setoff shall become final. The amount of the setoff after deduction of any charge authorized by section 231-56 shall be credited by the claimant agency against the debtor&rsquo;s debt. [L 1982, c 199, pt of ยง1]
